main event: A civilian pilot reported seeing a shiny white spherical object near Brockton, Mass., on 27 August 1950.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately 20 feet in diameter,The object was seen proceeding at a high rate of speed in an easterly direction,The observer noted that the object was at least 1,000 feet below his aircraft,No sound or exhaust smoke was detected,The witness had a 12-year-old passenger who confirmed the sighting.
witness description: A civilian pilot and a 12-year-old passenger
